articles.title: IMF approves $206 million emergency funding for cyclone - hit Sri Lanka recovery
articles.summary: The IMF has approved an emergency funding of $206 million under its rapid finance instrument to help Sri Lanka â€œaddress the urgent needs arising from the catastrophic Cyclone Ditwah and preserve macroeconomic stabilityâ€. The cyclone caused widespread destruction in the island nation and left over 643 people dead. articles.title: My brother deteriorating health wasnt recognised in 999 calls
articles.summary: 'My brother's deteriorating health went unrecognised' 1 day ago Share Save Asha Patel Nottingham Share Save BBC Qasim Hussain, 22, watched his brother's health decline as he called 999 numerous times When Adam Hussain repeatedly called 999 as his health took a turn for the worst, his brother thought help would come. The 23-year-old was suffering from appendicitis but his worsening symptoms were dismissed as non-emergency and he developed sepsis,

articles.title: Human - elephant conflict in Chittoor district shows sign of abatement
articles.summary: Home to the Koundinya Wildlife Sanctuary, Chittoor district has an envious population of over 140 wild elephants, half of which keep crisscrossing the thick forests of neighbouring Karnataka and Tamil Nadu as well. Seasonal migratory jaunts of the jumbos from as far as Mudumalai and Bannerghatta reserves of the Western Ghats trigger human-elephant conflict in several villages across more than a dozen mandals spread over Kuppam, Palamaner, Chittoo

timeline.event: Current story breaks and makes headlines

articles.title: Ten - year - old girl , Holocaust survivors among victims of Bondi Beach terror
articles.summary: A young girl and Holocaust survivors were among 15 people shot and killed when gunmen opened fire on a Jewish Hanukkah festival gathering on Australia's Bondi Beach a week ago. Bondi Beach attack: Australian PM orders police, intelligence review The elder gunman, 50-year-old Sajid Akram, was killed in a shootout with police. His 24-year-old son Naveed survived and has been charged on multiple counts including terrorism and 15 murders. Also Read |
